description: Fall is a time of year when people love to drink alcoholic beverages. One of the best&nbsp;rum cocktails for fall is Coquito. This delicious drink will keep you warm and cozy with its sweet coconut flavor.
name: Coquito

recipeInstructions.name: Add sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, cream of coconut, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, and ground nutmeg into a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and let cool.
recipeInstructions.text: Add sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, cream of coconut, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, and ground nutmeg into a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and let cool.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the rum and stir well. Let it cool.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the rum and stir well. Let it cool.

recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to sealable bottles and refrigerate overnight.
recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to sealable bottles and refrigerate overnight.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve in glasses over ice and some cinnamon sticks.
recipeInstructions.text: Serve in glasses over ice and some cinnamon sticks.
